the point of this ongoing assignment is to have students branch out and make professional and personal connections with folks they find interest in

Before you leave, you have to be able to answer the following at least 2 friends outside of your program at least 2 grad students whose work you are fascinated by OR that you've had a conversation with - must have evidence at least 2 professors that you've sought out for help/ advice that aren't your direct program folks - must have evidence at least 1 mentor request - must have evidence at least 2 peer mentoring events
